about_the_game:
The Capsa - Character Holiday Pattern Pack includes a selection of patterns to enable you to begin customizing your characters clothes.

This pack of cosmetic items contains clothing patterns for both male and female characters, supporting hoodies, t-shirts and long-sleeve t-shirts.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Character Valentines Patterns
  • Character Halloween Cat Patterns
  • Character Halloween Patterns
  • Character Saint Patricks Patterns
  • Character Thanksgiving Patterns
